  dplyr::group_by(Sample, COI) %>% 
  dplyr::summarise(totals = n()) %>% 
  dplyr::group_by(Sample) %>% 
  dplyr::mutate(totalTargets = sum(totals)) %>% 
  dplyr::mutate(fraction = totals/totalTargets)
